about_the_game:
LockYourDoor's demo serves as a small trial for horror enthusiasts, acting as a test before experiencing the full version. Your objective is to survive long enough while learning the basic game mechanics and logic. 

About The Game

  • 1-4 player online Co-op
    As a group of up to 4 survivors, you will explore your surroundings and confront various threats. Uncover the truth and make strategies together. Support one another to stay alive. (or choose to betray)

  • Challenging gameplay
    As time passes, more threats will emerge, and your small amount of light will fade even faster. Follow Darvin's guidance to adapt to new situations. Be smart and plan your next move carefully.

Key Features

  • Locking Your Door

    Each player will find keys for different rooms. Those keys can be used to lock-unlock certain doors for certain purposes. When night falls, players must be prepared to face the terrifying nightmares lurking in the dark.

  • Different AIs, Each With Unique Specializations.

    LockYourDoor features various AIs, each with its own features, strengths, and weaknesses.

  • Darvin's Notes And The Journal

    Follow your friend Darvin's guidance to survive and search for his clues along the way.

  • Strategizing The Night

    Players must be cautious when night falls. Each night, someone will be selected, and everyone will experience ferocious nightmares.

  • Items and Replayability
    LockYourDoor offers a variety of items, each with unique purposes. The more you play, the more you'll uncover their uses and learn to utilize them effectively. Item and key spawns are highly randomized, ensuring no two games ever feel the same.

  • Long and pleasing gameplay

WARNING

According to the developers, this game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing in a professional environment: Violence, gore, and general mature themes.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features flashing lights that may not be suitable for individuals with photosensitive conditions. It also includes loud jump scares. Viewer discretion is advised.

Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

short_description: LockYourDoor is a challenging survival horror game for 1-4 players. Your aim is to survive while you search for your friend Darvin. Try your best to stay alive and confront your nightmares. Only the patient and clever will survive.
